name: Call of the Golden Valley (demo)
description:
Your best friend's brother has gone missing near a remote Australian town. Is it a case of a reclusive family member who doesn't want to be found, or something more? 

Travel to a small Australian town. Interview the locals. Uncover clues. 

Call of the Golden Valley is a story-rich, mystery adventure game. Coming for PC and Mac in 2023!

www.osaurusstudios.com
